import { HashRouter as Router, Routes, Route } from 'react-router-dom' import Login from './pages/Login' import PersistLogin from './pages/PersistLogin' import Registration from './pages/Registration' import CreateGame from './pages/CreateGame' import EnterNames from './pages/EnterNames' import SelectSession from './pages/SelectSession' import SessionPreview from './pages/SessionPreview' import Game from './pages/Game' import EndScreen from './pages/EndScreen' function App() { return (
{/* 'Public' routes --> routes that can be accessed without token */} } /> } /> } /> {/* routes that have to be protected by a token PersistLogin is needed, so that the user doesn't have to login after page refresh */} }> } /> } /> } /> } /> } /> } /> } />
